column4: Is there a decent DVD burning program that can make menus and stuff for Ubuntu (Preferably Gnome)
Well, I figured that Gnomebaker wasn't gonna cut it with menus or .srts, unless I make it in another program first or something - I'll try k3b, though
Well, I'm gonna shop around a bit, I just thought some recommendations would be good to start off.
if you find anything cool let me know
